HPI 8366 Mercedes-Benz 190E 2.5-16 Evo II Black



This is a fantasy car of sorts as HPI went for the race-spec 190E Evo II in plain black. While there were certainly road going 190E Evo II's they don't look quite like this (ride height, wheels, EVO badge, etc.)

No matter, it's still an amazing model of an amazing car and looks almost too nice to touch. I feel like it needs a "Wet Paint" sign on it. :lol:
